Title: Relates to directing the department of motor vehicles to issue New York drivers licenses to certain individuals
Summary: Relates to directing the department of motor vehicles to issue New York drivers' licenses to individuals holding a valid or recently expired driver's license from a Caribbean country.
LawCode: Amd ยง502, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to permitting the exchange of drivers licenses from certain countries
